SELECT PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_PRICE,PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION,PRODUCT_IMG,SALES_CNT FROM PRODUCT

SELECT PR.PRODUCT_NAME, PR.PRODUCT_PRICE, PR.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PR.PRODUCT_IMG, PR.SALES_CNT, PM.PAY_DATE FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN PAYMENT PM ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = PM.PRODUCT_NO
AND PR.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY PM.PAY_DATE DESC
